description:
The Tram-Man arrives! And has Luffy, Bartolomeo and Desire on the run! The deeper the three fall into the pit, however, the more clear it becomes that Bill`s group hides a terrible secret!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An Underground Maze! Luffy vs. the Tram Human!
Chika Meikyuu: Luffy tai Torokko Ningen
I prigionieri della miniera - Luffy vs Averon
Le labyrinthe souterrain. Luffy vs. l`homme-wagon
Tief in der Mine! – Ruffy gegen den menschlichen Zug!
Un laberinto subterráneo. ¡Luffy contra el hombre vagoneta!
متاهة تحأرضيّة! لوفي ضدّ رجل العربة!
地下迷宮 ルフィVS[たい]トロッコ人間
